resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Recent (vidId TEXT PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, duration TEXT, currentTime TEXT)
ADD INTO Recent (vidId, title, duration, currentTime) VALUES (%1$s, %2$s, %3$s, %4$s)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO Recent (vidId, title, duration, currentTime) VALUES ('%1$s', '%2$s', '%3$s', '%4$s')
